actions.text: Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Science and Technology.  Report No: 97-271.

Resolution Agreed to in House (Amended) by Voice Vote.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation, Aviation and Materials

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration should submit to the Committee on Science and Technology full R&D program planning documentation with respect to the modernization and replacement of the FAA air traffic control enroute computer system.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration should submit to the Committee on Science and Technology: (1) a preliminary system description of the air traffic control en route computer system; and (2) a preliminary subsystem description of such system with a five year projection of funding requirements.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration should submit to the Committee on Science and Technology full R&D program planning documentation with respect to the modernization and replacement of the FAA air traffic control enroute computer system.
